name: Learningaboutgenes
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Genes are the building blocks of life and make us who we are. We study genes in bite-sized blurbs, exploring how they work and how they relate to our health. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
